Description: Up today we have a killer B.C. Rich Kerry King KKV Signature Series Flying V. Made in korea so it's much better quality than the chinese made variants. This particular model features the floyd rose trem, which is hard to find on a tremolo version of a Kerry King Signature guitar. Guitar plays and sounds fantastic. In really great condition, also. These are rare and hard to find especially in this condition. If you're a Kerry King/Slayer fan, then don't let this one pass you up! For more info, please review the condition description and pics. Have any questions, feel free to ask! :) Please ask any and all questions, prior to purchasing. **Sold as is, no returns** item has been described accurately. Whammy bar not included. Those can be picked up here on ebay for cheap, or you may already have one. No case or bag, but will be packaged extremely well for safe shipping. With proper shipping materials. Ships insured with tracking and signature confirmation. Please do not agree to buy if you do not plan to pay.
Title: B.C. Rich Kerry King KKV Signature V Made in Korea 6 String Electric Guitar
ConditionDescription: In terrific used condition. Only has 3 small blemishes. One on the front near the volume knob, one the side of the guitar, and some light scuff/swirl marks near the control plate. Other than that, guitars is in great used condition. All head stock points, and bottom points are intact with no chips, or touch up spots. Also pickups still have factory plastic covering. Electronics tested and working. Neck is good and straight, frets are in excellent condition. Great player!!
